SEARCH.SUGGEST_A_SONG_DESCRIPTION: Heard a tune you love? Share a song name or link. If autoplay is on, it'll be sent to the admin for a chance to be queued up!
SEARCH.ENTER_SONG_NAME_OR_SPOTIFY_URL: Enter song name or Spotify URL
SEARCH.WELCOME_TO_JAMBOX_DESCRIPTION: Jambox is a collaborative music queueing application. When an admin is logged in, you can suggest songs to be added to the queue.
